info.when: <s>Almost</s> Every First Thursday of the Month
info.address: 21509 John R Rd, Hazel Park, MI

about: We are a curated comedy show taking place every first Thursday (unless posted otherwise) of the month at Eastern Palace Club in Hazel Park, MI. Come see the best local and traveling comedians in the country for just $5. Also check out our sponsor, B.D.T. Smoke Shop.
